Name: Gringo's Blood & Sand
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: A Blood & Sand made with tequila. A classic Scotch whisky-based Blood & Sand is made with equal parts of all four ingredients, but the cherry brandy, vermouth and orange seem to overwhelm tequila when used in place of Scotch, hence the much higher proportion of spirit in this riff.
History: Created in February 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Gringo's Blood & Sand contains 223 calories
